title: Please update the download link for lol on the website
body: This message is concerning riot games. I am just asking if you could please put up a more recent version of League of Legends on your signup page because my client is quite faulty and very often I need to delete it and reinstall it again and everytime I do so I have to go your website and download a very old version which I then have to update and the update is usually about 5GB and usually takes about 6 hours. my wifi is quite slow and I can only use 15GB a month so im just asking you for this favour so that I can continue to play League of Legends.

replies.body:
Hey there,

The file you retrieve from the download page is merely the tool to;

* Install all prerequisites for the game
* Install the patcher

The patcher is the tool that downloads all the necessary resources for the game, were these to be available via a direct download you would still need to download the same total filesize that the patcher would retrieve.
